name: git-wt
description: Cross-platform Git worktree management tool with intelligent partial matching and tagging

scripts.postinstall:
echo '
✅ git-wt installed! Run "wt help" to get started.
'
scripts.cp: mkdir -p bin && cp wt.sh bin/wt && chmod +x bin/wt && cp bin/wt ~/.nvm/versions/node/$(node --version)/bin/ && echo '✅ Copied wt.sh to bin/wt and NVM global bin'
